articles.title: WPK and NDC Give Banquet
articles.content:
WPK and NDC Give Banquet
Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK National Defence Commission gave a banquet on Friday on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					When Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the WPK, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the KPA, appeared in the banquet hall, all the participants enthusiastically welcomed him, extending the highest glory and the warmest thanks to him.
					
					He warmly waved back to the enthusiastically cheering participants and heartily congratulated them who are devoting themselves to the defence of the country and the prosperity of the socialist country, upholding the Songun revolutionary leadership of the party. 
					
					Present there were Ri Yong Ho, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK and chief of the General Staff of the KPA, Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, Choe Ryong Hae, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK, member of the Central Military Commission of the WPK and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Jong Gak, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and first vice director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, Ju Kyu Chang, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK, member of the Central Military Commission of the WPK and department director of the C.C., the WPK, U Tong Chuk, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and member of the Central Military Commi
					
					 ssion of the WPK, Kim Kyong Ok, Kim Won Hong, Kim Myong Guk, Jong Myong Do, Kim Yong Chol and Yun Jong Rin, members of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su, department directors of the NDC, and other commanding officers of the army. 
					
					Present there on invitation were Kim Ki Nam and Choe Thae Bok, members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Kang Sok Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-premier of the Cabinet, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun, Thae Jong Su, and Kim Phyong Hae, alternate members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, Mun Kyong Dok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK and chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, and leading officials of the society.
					
					Ri Yong Ho made a speech at the banquet. 
					
					The participants raised their glasses to the health of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Concert Given to Mark DPRK Anniversary
articles.content:
Concert Given to Mark DPRK Anniversary
Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- A concert was given at the Moranbong Theater on Friday to mark the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					 Audience included senior army and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of armed forces, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, service members of the KPA and working people in Pyongyang. 
					
					 Present there on invitation were overseas compatriots, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, diplomatic envoys of various countries and representatives of international organizations here and members of the military attaches corps.
					
					 The concert began with overture to orchestral music "Cantata to Comrade Kim Jong Il." The colorful performance included orchestras "General on a Galloping White Horse" and "Unforgettable Echoes over Lagoon Samil" and string orchestra for pizzicato "The Country Is So Good." 
					
					 Musicians successfully represented the dynamic leadership with which Kim Jong Il has steadily glorified President Kim Il Sung's Juche cause of army-building and the undying feats he has performed by developing the KPA into a-match-for-a hundred revolutionary armed forces, bringing about a signal change in building a thriving nation and ushering in a heyday of the prosperous country.

articles.title: Dancing Parties Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties Held
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place here and in various provinces, cities and county seats of the country on Friday. They were to celebrate the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and the 93rd birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk. 
					 As song "Please Receive Our Salute" reverberated far and wide, youth and students presented merry dances, extending profound thanks to Kim Jong Il who has developed the KPA into invincible revolutionary armed forces of Mt. Paektu and brought about a great change in building a rich and powerful country.
					
					 They also presented graceful dances to the tune of songs "The Tuman River Full of Memories" and "Triumphant War Song in Forest," looking back with deep emotion on Kim Jong Suk's noble revolutionary career and undying feats. 
					
					 Dancing parties held in various parts of the country successfully represented the will of the youth and students to devotedly defend Kim Jong Il and give steady continuity to the tradition of Juche.

articles.title: Inter-governmental Protocol between DPRK-China Inked
articles.content:
Inter-governmental Protocol between DPRK-China Inked 
Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- A protocol on the 44th meeting of the DPRK-China inter-governmental committee for scientific and technological cooperation was signed in Beijing on December 24.
					Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were members of the DPRK government science and technology delegation led by Choe Sang Gon, vice-chairman of the State Science and Technology Commission, and a minister of the DPRK embassy in Beijing and from the Chinese side a vice-minister of Science and Technology of China and officials concerned.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Jong Suk 
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the bust of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero, at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on Friday on the occasion of her 93rd birth anniversary. 
					 Seen before the bust was a wreath sent by Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were senior party, army and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, leading officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, people from all walks of life and school youth and children in Pyongyang. 
					
					 Laid there were wreaths in the name of the WPK Central Committee, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the DPRK Cabinet, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, KPA units, educational and media organs, the Joint National Organization of the Korean Children's Union, party and power organs, factories and farms in Pyongyang, etc. 
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of Kim Jong Suk who glorified her revolutionary noble life by devotedly defending the leader, holding him in high esteem as the great sun, and performed undying exploits by giving steady continuity to Kim Il Sung's nation.
					
					 Floral baskets were placed before her statues in Kim Jong Suk County and Hoeryong City and at Kim Jong Suk Naval University and Kim Jong Suk General Military Academy on the same day.
					
					 Meanwhile, Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, and its members placed bouquets before her bust on the same day. 
					
					 The military attaches corps here also paid floral tribute to her bust on the day.

articles.title: Sports Contest for Osandok Prize Closes
articles.content:
Sports Contest for Osandok Prize Closes
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The sports contest for Osandok prize closed with due ceremony at the Ice Rink on Friday. It has been under way since Dec. 10 to mark the birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 Trophy cups and medals were conferred on the players who proved successful in figure skating and short track speed skating at the ceremony.
					
					 Attending the ceremony were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned and sports persons. 
					
					 The closing address was made by Pak Myong Chol, minister of Physical Culture and Sports.

articles.title: Champion of World Peace
articles.content:
Champion of World Peace
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are greeting the 19th anniversary of Kim Jong Il as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), December 24.
					 In the 1990s the imperialists, availing themselves of the collapse of socialism in some countries, directed the spearhead of attack to the DPRK, which was keeping to socialism.
					
					 The Korean people, under the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Il, frustrated their effort to isolate and stifle the DPRK and defended the country's security and sovereignty, as well as socialism, by dint of Songun (military-first) politics, considerably augmenting the position and dignity of the nation in the international arena.
					
					 As socialist Korea has been strengthened militarily thanks to his Songun-based leadership and politics, it has been possible to avert a military conflict in Northeast Asia, including the Korean peninsula, and prevent the outbreak of another war in Korea. 
					
					 With the Korean people making a breach in the international political structure influenced by high-handedness and unilateralism, the imperialists have been in trouble in their anti-socialist strategy for dominating the world.
					
					 The progressive people across the world are admiring Kim Jong Il for successfully leading the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle and the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Symbol of Victorious Songun Revolution
articles.content:
Symbol of Victorious Songun Revolution
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- December 24 is the 19th anniversary of Kim Jong Il as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 After taking the top position of the army, he has done his best to strengthen the KPA on the basis of the unique idea that both peace and socialism are ensured by arms and the destiny of the party, the state and the people is also guaranteed by the army.
					
					 Through his continuous army inspection tour, a heyday has been opened in the building of Juche-based revolutionary armed forces with Songun (military-first) politics becoming a powerful mode of socialist politics in the present time.
					
					 The supreme commander has achieved harmony of the army and the people in ideology and working manner with the KPA as core of single-minded unity.
					
					 He has also given field guidance to many industrial establishments to bring about great changes throughout the country.
					
					 The Korean army and people are praising him as the symbol of the victorious Songun revolution.

articles.title: Korean Society Replete with Moral Obligation
articles.content:
Korean Society Replete with Moral Obligation
Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Fifteen years has passed since General Secretary Kim Jong Il published a famous work, "Respecting the Forerunners of the Revolution Is a Noble Moral Obligation of Revolutionaries."
					 The work stresses that with a strong sense of moral obligation respecting their forerunners can the revolutionaries defend the gains of the revolution through generations and successfully advance the cause of socialism.
					
					 After the work was published on December 25, the spirit of respecting forerunners of the revolution has been fully displayed in Korean society.
					
					 The Kumsusan Memorial Palace was built as the sacred headquarters of Juche to keep President Kim Il Sung in state. The revolution and construction have been accelerated in line with his ideas and lifetime intention.  
					
					 The indomitable revolutionary spirit and fighting manner created by the forerunners have been carried forward in the effort for the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 Their ideal and desire have come true with huge projects like Taegyedo tideland reclamation, Nyongwon Power Station and Miru Plain Waterway completed and streamlined industrial establishments built throughout the country and material foundations for the improvement of the people's living standard further consolidated. 
					
					 In Korea the entire people live as a large harmonious family with such traits as donating one's blood and flesh pieces to others to save them from the jaws of death and sincerely assisting war veterans and disabled soldiers prevailing in society.

articles.title: NRC Accuses S. Korea of Kicking up Another Foolish Row
articles.content:
NRC Accuses S. Korea of Kicking up Another Foolish Row
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Reconciliation Council released a statement on Friday blasting the puppet regime of south Korea for kicking off an anti-DPRK smear campaign, raising such issues as what it called "probe into the truth behind the abduction of south Koreans by the north during the war time".
					 The statement said:
					
					 The puppet forces asserted that they would set up an organization for a smear campaign with the puppet prime minister as its chairman and the minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade, the minister of Unification and the minister of Defense as its members and launch such activities as confirming the whereabouts of the above-said "abductees," realizing reunions with them and their repatriation. This is another vicious political provocation and unpardonable racket for confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The above-said forces paint even those who came to the care of the DPRK of their own accord as "abductees" and are using them for their propaganda purpose. This brings to light the hypocrisy of their burlesque. 
					
					 As far as the abduction during the Korean War is concerned, the puppet regime was wholly to blame for the crime as it lured and abducted a great many people in the northern half of Korea with the threat of a bomb attack in collusion with the U.S. imperialists. 
					
					 As proven by "the massacre of civilians of Kochang", etc. the puppet forces mercilessly killed a large number of innocent civilians during the war on charges that they "conspired" with "enemy troops" and helped them. 
					
					 It is preposterous, indeed, for the perpetrators of such monstrous atrocities to talk about the "abduction" by someone.
					
					 The smear campaign kicked off by the puppet regime over the above-said issue of "abduction," a fiction, is aimed at diverting elsewhere the public opinion critical of its sycophancy and treachery, fascism, confrontation and war moves, getting rid of its isolation and crisis and saving its policy for confrontation with the DPRK from total failure.
					
					 The above-said traitors had better stop such ridiculous racket at once, bearing in mind that such poor farce would only throw obstacles in the way of solving the issue of the separated families and relatives.

articles.title: KCNA on Korean Peninsula and US Strategy for Alliance for Aggression
articles.content:
KCNA on Korean Peninsula and US Strategy for Alliance for Aggression
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The politico-military situation on the Korean Peninsula that was driven to the brink of a war this year is arousing deep concern of the international community.
					 The U.S. is entirely to blame for the alarming developments on the peninsula this year as it used the peninsula for realizing its strategy to dominate East Asia.
					
					 The U.S. focused its efforts on knocking into shape a triangular military alliance grouping the U.S., Japan, and south Korea to hold hegemony in the Asia-Pacific. 
					
					 It put the alliance into test by escalating the situation on the peninsula this year.
					
					 The U.S. tightened the U.S.-Japan, U.S.-south Korea and south Korea-Japan "strategic partnership" in political, economic and military fields. Their joint actions included study of "defense" and "contingency" and military exercises.
					
					 The U.S. orchestrated the "Cheonan" sinking case and the Yonphyong Island conflict and used them as a golden opportunity for stepping up the formation of the alliance.
					
					 The U.S., Japan and south Korea demonstrated unprecedented joint actions in reacting to the warship case and island shelling incident. They employed every means and method to add fuel to fire, escalating the conflict.
					
					 The U.S. recently blustered that it would "ensure the 'security' of south Korea by providing nuclear umbrella to it" and it would offer all types of ultra-modern military hardware to modernize the armed forces of south Korea.
					
					 It is also seeking to turn Japan into a more dependable bridgehead for its forces within the framework of the triangular military alliance.
					
					 The number of fighter bombers in the U.S. forces base in Okinawa is on the steady increase while Sasebo and other ports of Japan are being turned into their military bases.
					
					 Under the patronage of the U.S., Japan has spent a huge amount of funds for latest type military planes, ground-to-air missiles, all types of warships and tanks.
					
					 Feeling precarious about the rapid change in economic and military equilibrium in the new century, the U.S., styling itself an "Asia-Pacific state", has strengthened "military cooperation" with several Asian countries and increased military pressure on China, Russia and other "potential rivals."
					
					  Japan and south Korea are acting as shock brigades for realizing the U.S. strategy for aggression, lost to shame.
					
					 The alliance is, in actuality, operational after having all terms and appearance as a collective military bloc. 
					
					 The U.S. is kick-starting the triangular military alliance billed as an "anti-communist crusade" arrangements for whose creation have long been in the making along with NATO. This is a grave action for aggression quite contrary to the global trend for peace.
					
					 The international community should accept it as an urgent requirement for stability and peace in Northeast Asia to foil the U.S. moves to round off alliance for aggression.

articles.title: Papers Observe Anniversary of KPA Supreme Commander
articles.content:
Papers Observe Anniversary of KPA Supreme Commander
Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Leading papers Friday editorially observe the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's gaining of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army. They noted that Kim Jong Il is a symbol of the dignity, victory and mightiness of Songun Korea, stressing that the DPRK would enjoy eternal grandeur and prosperity under his leadership.
					 Rodong Sinmun said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il is a rare illustrious commander of Songun as he leads the country and the revolution with his unique political mode of Songun, an organic combination of politics and military affairs. Herein lie the source of the steady development of the Korean revolutionary armed forces and the high dignity and honor of the country and the nation.
					
					 The Songun exploits performed by Kim Jong Il glorified before the world the country, once trampled underfoot by foreign forces for being weak in national power, as a politico-military power and the strongest power in independence as it is possessed of matchless military power and the single-minded unity. This Songun exploit signifies the greatest feat as he translated the centuries-old desire of the Korean people into a brilliant reality.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is the benevolent father and a mainstay for the faith of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is not only an invincible and iron-willed commander but a great supreme commander who trained the KPA as an invincible army and leads the single-minded tens of millions of ranks of revolutionary fighters with love and trust.
					
					 While glorifying the country before the world as an invincible power, Kim Jong Il has wisely steered the struggle of the Korean people for the great prosperity of Kim Il Sung's nation by dint of the matchless politico-military power.
					
					 We should advance full of confidence along the road of the Songun revolution led by Kim Jong Il, bearing deep in mind the immense pride and honor of recording a new chronicle of the victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche under his steersmanship.
					
					 Minju Joson stressed that the DPRK is sure to emerge victorious in the drive for building a great prosperous and powerful nation as long as the revolutionary armed forces are commanded by Kim Jong Il and there are the servicepersons and people single-mindedly united around him.

articles.title: Anniversaries of DPRK Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversaries of DPRK Marked Abroad
Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Lectures, seminars, meetings and book and photo exhibitions were held in the Czech Republic, Austria, Brazil, Ethiopia, Italy, Sweden and Russia between Dec. 12 and 17 on the occasions of the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's gaining of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 93rd birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 Displayed were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, books and photos on the exploits performed by the three commanders of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing the Korean people's efforts to build a thriving nation and achieve national reunification.
					
					 The Songun politics of Kim Jong Il helped lay a foundation for building a thriving nation in the DPRK and paved the way for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, said the chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association.
					
					 Under the leadership of Kim Jong Il the DPRK emerged a military power with powerful war deterrent, said the chairman of the Brazil-DPRK Friendship Parliamentary Group.
					
					 The secretary general of the Italian Committee for the Reunification and Peace of Korea praised Kim Jong Suk as an outstanding political and military activist and a great woman revolutionary who performed great exploits for the Korean revolution by devoting herself to the independence of the country and the building of a rich and powerful country.
					
					 The chief of the Tynda City Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of the Russian Philosophy Association and other speakers stressed that under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, the Korean people would build a great prosperous and powerful nation in the near future and surely achieve the reunification of the country.
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the events held in the Czech Republic, Austria and Sweden.

articles.title: Corea prosperara eternamente bajo la direccion de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Corea prosperara eternamente bajo la direccion de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Los periodicos centrales, en sus editoriales dedicados el dia 24 al 19o aniversario del nombramiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, senalan que el es el simbolo de la dignidad, la victoria y la invencibilidad de Corea del Songun y subrayan que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea prosperara para siempre bajo la guia del Comandante Insigne del monte Paektu.
					  El incesante  fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de Corea, la dignidad y el honor de la patria y la nacion reside en quedar fiel a la guia del Dirigente quien dirige la patria y la revolucion practicando la original politica de Songun que combina organicamente la politica y los asuntos militares, senala el diario Rodong Sinmun y prosigue:
					
					  El Dirigente ha convertido la patria, pisoteada en el pasado por las fuerzas extranjeras debido a la debil fuerza nacional, en la invencible potencia politica, militar e independiente en el mundo, lo cual es la mayor proeza de el quien hizo realizar con brillantez el anhelo secular del pueblo coreano.
					
					  El Dirigente es el padre generoso del ejercito y el pueblo y el pilar de la conviccion.
					
					  Es tambien el invencible general de acero y gran Comandante Supremo quien con el amor y la confianza ha formado al EPC como las invencibles fuerzas armadas y conduce a la victoria a todo el pueblo coreano.
					
					    Debemos guardar el infinito orgullo y la dignidad de abrir el nuevo milenio para el triunfo de la causa revolucionaria del Juche gozando de la guia del gran Comandante del monte Paektu y marchar a pasos firmes por el camino de la revolucion del Songun conducida por el.
					
					  El periodico Minju Joson subraya, a su vez, que es definitiva la victoria de la gran potencia prospera porque el Dirigente Kim Jong Il se pone en el puesto cimero de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias, y todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo estan unidos compactamente en torno a el.

articles.title: Depositan ofrendas y cestos de flores ante el busto de Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Depositan ofrendas y cestos de flores ante el busto de Kim Jong Suk
						
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 93o aniversario del natalicio de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk fueron depositadas el dia 24 las ofrendas florales ante el busto de ella en el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios en el Monte Taesong.
					  Tambien estaba puesta ahi la ofrenda floral enviada por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					  Ademas, fueron colocadas las ofrendas florales en nombre del CC del PTC, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC, los Ministerios de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares y de Seguridad del Pueblo, las organizaciones de masas, ministerios e instituciones centrales, unidades del EPC, los organos de educacion, prensa e informacion, el conjunto nacional de Organizaciones de la Union de Ninos de Corea, los organismos del partido y el Poder, fabricas y granjas en la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los cuadros directivos del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades de masas, ministerios e instituciones centrales, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y de las Fuerzas Populares del Interior de Corea, trabajadores de distintos sectores, jovenes y ninos escolares en la capital.
					
					  Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio recordando las inmarcesibles proezas de la Heroina quien hizo brillar su vida revolucionaria con la defensa a muerte al lider y unio con firmeza la arteria vital de la nacion de Kim Il Sung. 
					
					  Ademas, fueron depositados los cestos de flores tambien ante las estatuas de bronce erguidas en el distrito Kim Jong Suk, la ciudad de Hoeryong, la Academia de Fuerzas Navales Kim Jong Suk y la Escuela General de Oficiales Kim Jong Suk. 
					
					Por otra parte, lo hicieron ante el busto de ella en el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios en el monte Taesong el representante y otros miembros de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang asi como el Cuerpo de Agregados Militares en Corea.

articles.title: Concierto dedicado al 24 de diciembre
articles.content:
Concierto dedicado al 24 de diciembre
						
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 24 en el Teatro Moranbong el concierto por el 19o aniversario del nombramiento del Dirigente   Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del 93o del natalicio de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk.
					  Lo vieron los cuadros directivos del ejercito y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organos de las fuerzas armadas, organizaciones de masas, ministerios y organismos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del EPC asi como trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					  A la ocasion fueron invitados los coreanos en ultramar, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises, los delegados de organizaciones internacionales y los miembros del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares, acreditados en Corea.
					
					  En la escena iniciada con el preludio de musica orquestal "Al Camarada Kim Jong Il" se pusieron diversas piezas como la musica orquestal  "General corre a caballo blanco", "Inolvidables ecos en el lago Samil" y la orquesta musical para pizzicato "Este territorio es muy bueno".
					
					  Los ejecutantes elogiaron altamente las inmortales hazanas del Dirigente quien hace brillar infinitamente las proezas del Presidente Kim Il Sung realizadas en la construccion del ejercito de tipo jucheano, fortalecio el EPC como el ejercito revolucionario listo para combatir uno contra cien enemigos, logro grandes cambios en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera y abrio la era dorada de la prosperidad de la patria.

articles.title: CNR condena campana intrigante anti-RPDC de banda surcoreana
articles.content:
CNR condena campana intrigante anti-RPDC de banda surcoreana
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El portavoz del Comite Nacional por la Reconciliacion (CNR) hizo publica el dia 24 una declaracion en relacion con que en estos dias la banda de titeres surcoreanos recurre a la campana intrigante contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hablando tanto de "esclarecimiento de la verdad del secuestro por el Norte en el tiempo de guerra". 
					La banda de titeres surcoreanos anuncia que instituira un aparato intrigante presidido por el premier titere e integrado por los cabecillos de los ministerios de Relaciones Exteriores y Comercio, de Reunificacion y de Defensa Nacional para averiguar el paradero de los "secuestrados por el Norte en el tiempo de guerra" y desarrollar las actividades para el encuentro y el regreso de ellos, senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					Esto es otra siniestra provocacion politica y acto conflictivo nunca tolerable contra la RPDC. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos intentan utilizar en sus maniobras intrigantes hasta a las personalidades que pasaron a la RPDC por la causa justa tildandoles de "secuestrados por el Norte en el tiempo de guerra", lo cual muestra fehacientemente que esta campana es una farsa tan absurda.
					
					En lo tocante al crimen de secuestro en el tiempo de guerra, el culpable principal es la banda titere del Sur de Corea que en contubernio con los imperialistas norteamericanos sedujo de manera coercitiva muchos habitantes norcoreanos al Sur de Corea amenazandolos con las bombas atomicas.
					
					Como revela el "caso de masacre a los civiles de Kochang", los titeres asesinaron despiadadamente muchos inocentes civiles diciendo que estos tenian "relaciones secretas" con alguien y lo ayudaban. 
					
					Sin embargo, los culpables de tales archi-crimenes cuestionan el "secuestro" de alguien con la malsana intencion de desviar la punta de lanza de la opinion publica dirigida a si mismos por su servilismo a grandes potencias y maniobras de confrontacion y de guerra, salvarse del aislamiento y de la crisis y mantener la fracasada politica de confrontacion anti-RPDC.
					
					Los traidores surcoreanos deben poner de inmediato fin a ese alboroto vano y sucio, dandose clara cuenta de que tal conducta puede obstaculizar la solucion del problema de los familiares y parientes separados.

articles.title: Situacion de Peninsula Coreana y estrategia de EE.UU., comenta ATCC
articles.content:
Situacion de Peninsula Coreana y estrategia de EE.UU., comenta ATCC
						
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Este ano, el ambiente politico y militar de la Peninsula Coreana, que esta a punto de estallarse la guerra en cualquier momento, provoca una gran precaucion de la sociedad internacional.
					Todos los incidentes de este ano, que acarrearon la crisis de la citada Peninsula, se deben enteramente a que EE.UU. la utilizo como la victima de la realizacion de su estrategia de dominacion sobre Asia Oriental.
					
					Para tomar la supremacia en la region de Asia-Pacifico, EE.UU. acelero el perfeccionamiento de la alianza militar tripartita EE.UU., Japon y el Sur de Corea.
					
					Tambien, el imperio probo el uso de la alianza militar tripartita mediante la agravacion de la crisis de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Fortalecio mas estrechamente en lo politico, economico y militar las "relaciones de alianza estrategica" entre EE.UU. y Japon, entre EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea y entre el Sur de Corea y Japon. Y desarrollo sucesivamente las acciones conjuntas de toda indole como el llamado estudio conjunto de "defensa" y el "tiempo de emergencia" y los ejercicios militares conjuntos. 
					
					EE.UU. aprovecho el incidente intrigante del hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan" y el choque armado en la isla Yonphyong como una buena oportunidad para perfeccionar la alianza militar tripartita. 
					
					En el trato de esos casos EE.UU., Japon y el Sur mostraron la concordancia sin precedente y agravaron mas el conflicto echando lena al fuego, de modo que se valieron de todos los medios y metodos para realizar su objetivo. 
					
					Hace poco, EE.UU. anuncio oficialmente que "seguira preservando con el paraguas nuclear la `seguridad` del Sur de Corea" y le ofrecera los equipos de guerra ultramodernos de toda indole para modernizar los armamentos del ejercito titere surcoreano.
					
					Ademas, convierte a Japon en el trampolin de las tropas norteamericanas en el marco de la alianza militar tripartita. 
					
					Se emplazan ininterrumpidamente en la base militar norteamericana en Okinawa los cazabombarderos de la fuerza aerea norteamericana y los puertos como Sasebo se convierten en las bases militares de las tropas yanquis.
					
					Bajo el amparo de EE.UU., Japon gasta enormes fondos para contar con los armamentos ultramodernos como aviones militares, misiles tierra-mar y tierra-aire, los buques de combate de todos tipos y tanques.
					
					Al sentir la inquietud por el cambio vertiginoso del equilibrio economico y militar en la region de Asia-Pacifico en el nuevo siglo, EE.UU. se autodenomina de "Estado de Asia-Pacifico" y fortalece la "cooperacion militar" con varios paises asiaticos intensificando el grado de la presion militar sobre los "paises enemigos potenciales" como China y Rusia. 
					
					Japon y los titeres surcoreanos, sin sentir verguenza, se presentan como brigadas de choque de la estrategia agresiva de EE.UU.
					
					Hoy dia, la alianza militar tripartita funciona con mas suficientes condiciones y figura del bloque militar colectivo. 
					
					EE.UU. pone en accion en el Nordeste Asiatico el sistema de guerra de la "cruzada anticomunista" junto con la OTAN, lo cual deviene un grave acto agresivo que se opone a la tendencia a la paz de Asia y el resto del mundo.
					
					La sociedad internacional debe aceptar la detencion de las maniobras de EE.UU. tendentes a perfeccionar la alianza militar tripartita de caracter agresivo como una demanda realista para la estabilidad y la paz del Nordeste Asiatico.
